pkgmetadata.longdescription: Linear Regression Stability to Significance Reversal // Tests linear regressions for significance reversal through leave- one(multiple)-out and shifting/addition of response values. The paradigm of the package is loosely based on the somewhat forgotten "dfstat" criterion (Belsley, Kuh Welsch 1980 doi:10.1002/0471725153.ch2), which tests influential values in linear models from their effect on statistical inference, i.e. changes in p-value.
